title: MD
biography: Lavanya Tripathi Konidela is an Indian actress who primarily works in Telugu films. Tripathi is a recipient of several accolades including nominations for two SIIMA Awards and one Filmfare Awards South.
aiSummary: S. M. Tripathi is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 38 at Stroke research (Member). Has been published in Cell reports. Medicine, JAMA network open, Nature communications. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
